entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.5
entry.content:
• [Requestarr] A new Huntarr implementation of requesting movies and tv shows that tie into your current ARR’s
  • [Mobile View] New Header and Side Bar that long caused issues with stacking issues
  • [Synology] Reverted code to what was in 8.1.3 (will put out guide to assist others for docker compose - Thanks Tony)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/8.1.4...8.1.5

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.6
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] Moved settings to it’s own section that now combined itself, scheduling, and user (has own sidebar view)
  • [Apps] Changed the name on the sidebar to Huntarr. Eventually Swaparr will be moved out from apps and have it’s own section
  • [Settings] Settings auto-save mostly resolved by at least saving now (may require page refresh, will be patched)
  • [User] Updated from legacy code so it acts like the rest of Huntarr (not a noticeable change)
  • [BUG] Linking plex from settings does not work (will patch next version)
  • [BUG] Some settings will require a log out or page refersh to take affect (will patch next version)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.8
entry.content:
• [Settings] Moved Apprise to new location settings called notifications
  • [Huntarr] Fixed settings sidebar to not show up in mobile mode when not being used
  • [Settings] Ensured that auto-saving properly works by ensuring the rest of Huntarr respect the changes immediatley

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.9
entry.content:
Fixes

  • [Huntarr] Added more code to ensure proper shutdown to prevent database corruption
  • [Settings] Removed unnecessary toast notifications
  • [Settings] Removed unnecessary header since we do not have the save button anymore and the nested form
  • [Settings] Fixed timezone saving issues and having them reflect and take effect in the system right away
  • [Scheduler] Changing time zones shows the proper server clock change
  • [2FA Settings] The copy button works under the user settings
  • [Apprise] Apprise notifications fixed
  • [Logs] Correct time shows up correctly and auto-adjusts to timezone changes
  • [Logs] Removed some console and log spam
  • [Stateful Management] - Times change if time zones change

Tracking Next:  - [Settings] Fix Plex Setup Login - [Whisparr] Add individual stateful management
